questions.question: Considering the overall form and packaging, what is the dominant shape of this product?

What is the most prominent text style used on the product's packaging, referring to the label's visual characteristics?

What is the distinct visual detail running perpendicular to the seam on the product's surface?

Focusing solely on the visual appearance, what can you infer about the product's intended thickness or gauge?
